entity.name: Scott Morrison
entity.description: Prime Minister of Australia, Scott Morrison

text: @NITV Heartbreaking response to people in real and extended need by the #auspol government. #homelessness has been ignored for too long. Too many people suffering due successive governments gutting the public #housing stock. This must stop. @ScottMorrisonMP @AlboMP #Covid19 #DoBetter
